channel.title: Grace's Sports Blog
channel.description: A place to look at sports with a more analytical eye

item.title: How Important are Kickers in Securing Wins?
item.dc:creator: Grace B. Remus
item.description:
Are kickers the most important part of a football team? How much do their points matter to a teams’ result

Code 
library(tidyverse)
